Title: Promote rural collectivization
Publisher: Hubei renmin chubanshe (湖北人民出版社)
Notes: This is the right half of a 'door gods' poster (门神画). The other half unfortunately is not present in the collection.The bounties of joining the collective are fully illustrated.This is a print from a later impression (September 1956).
Theme: Land Reform and Collectivization (1950-1953)Door Gods (门神)
